short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intelligent title case converter with USD money formatting and OCR capabilities

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MANUAL:

Title Case Converter is a powerful text formatting tool with intelligent case conversion, USD formatting, and OCR capabilities.

Features:

Smart Title Case Conversion:

Handles common abbreviations, state codes, and business entities
Preserves formatting for financial terms (IPO, CEO, NASDAQ, etc.)
Maintains proper capitalization rules for articles and prepositions
USD Money Formatting:

Convert numbers to proper USD format
Handles decimal places and comma separators
Perfect for financial documents and reports
OCR Text Extraction:

Extract text from images or unselectable content
High-accuracy text recognition
Easy screen area selection
Quick Setup:

Install the extension from Chrome Web Store
Access keyboard shortcuts at: chrome://extensions/shortcuts
Configure shortcuts (defaults):
Title Case: Ctrl+G (⌘+G on Mac)
USD Format: Ctrl+E (⌘+E on Mac)
OCR: Ctrl+Shift+O (⌘+Shift+O on Mac)
Usage:

Title Case Conversion:

Select text
Use keyboard shortcut or right-click menu
Text is instantly converted with proper capitalization rules
USD Formatting:

Select a number
Use keyboard shortcut or right-click menu
Number is formatted as USD currency
OCR Text Extraction:

Use keyboard shortcut or right-click menu
Select screen area with cursor
Extracted text is copied to clipboard
Additional Features:

Customizable business entities and financial terms
Optional automatic clipboard copying
User-friendly notifications
Settings page for feature customization
Perfect for:

Writers and Editors
Financial Professionals
Content Creators
Anyone working with text formatting
For feature requests or support, contact: uestliguci@gmail.com
Subject line: "Title Case Converter - Feature Request/Support"

Thank you for using Title Case Converter!
